job_tasks.phrase: You will help to significantly shape Miro's Core product and have a high impact on the daily lives of 45M+ knowledge workers collaborating and driving team alignment with our features!
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the high-level impact and strategic contribution of the role to the company's core product and user base, aligning with understanding business context and strategic goals.

job_tasks.phrase: You will be working with Miro top initiatives to integrate generative AI capabilities with core user flows and help shaping the collaboration workspace.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes integrating AI features into existing user flows and product development, which falls under traditional software engineering tasks focused on product enhancement.

job_tasks.phrase: Design and development on Miro canvas components
job_tasks.justification: This is a core software development task focused on building and enhancing product components.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate canvas components with in-house generative AI models
job_tasks.justification: This involves integrating AI models into existing software components, a key aspect of software engineering that bridges AI capabilities with the product.

job_tasks.phrase: Add functionality and drive improvements to microservices-based APIs
job_tasks.justification: This is a standard software engineering task focused on developing and improving backend services and APIs.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to development and execution of technical strategy
job_tasks.justification: This involves contributing to the overall technical direction and planning, which aligns with understanding and executing business/technical strategy.

soft_skills.phrase: Help with the hiring of new talent
soft_skills.justification: This task involves team building and interaction, aligning with the definition of collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: Be a role model, technically strong to mentor other engineers in the team
soft_skills.justification: Mentoring and being a role model are key aspects of team collaboration and knowledge sharing.

profile.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional software engineering tasks such as designing and developing components, integrating features into existing systems (microservices APIs), and contributing to technical strategy. While it explicitly mentions integrating 'generative AI capabilities' and 'in-house generative AI models,' it does not detail tasks related to model development, fine-tuning, prompt engineering, or specific GenAI frameworks. This indicates that the role is primarily a software engineering position that leverages AI as a feature within the product, rather than a role focused on the AI model development itself. This aligns with the definition of an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is clear and detailed regarding the responsibilities, explicitly stating the integration of generative AI into core product features while emphasizing traditional software engineering tasks. This clarity allows for a confident classification.
